name: Bird Game (itch) (ChillPenguin1993, TOMO, EmYo)
description:
Short story-based game made for the Community Game Jam 2019.

I have experience programming, but I decided to learn the Godot engine for something new, and this was my first time making a very dialogue-based game. There were 2 artists on the team and it was their first time animating a walk cycle as well, so overall it was quite a challenge. We got a lot done though, and hopefully made a decent (albeit rather short) game. Enjoy!
